name: Uncanny Horror (Online Multiplayer PvP)
description:
Unycanny Horror was made for the 1 Game A Month game jam and is still heavily under development. 

At the moment it's an online shooter with a twist.  Play against your friends and explore the mixed pixelated and realistic environment. 

At the moment the game is ste up at max 8 players.

Movement: WASD

Look arround: Mouse

Shoot: LMB

Run: L Shift

Mouse Sensitivity +: P 

Mouse Sensitivity -: O

Development: Prokisch Dani

Design: Prokisch Dani, Boruzs Adam, Rafael Erik Benjamin

Music and Sound: Boruzs Adam
